title: What are 5 examples of social ethics? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a US citizen I must inform you that, regrettably, we no longer subscribe to social ethics, and may not offer the responses considered acceptable by the rest of the world community, not that it won’t set a precedent.

Gosh, I reckon that depends on the social setting you are in, the particular group of people, customs. For me, show respect to all, be polite, humble, helpful, show a sense of caring for the people you are with, be appreciative and show gratitude. Doing all those things costs you nothing, yet could gain you everything, but you don’t do it for gain, but for love of all people.
